vue.splitEditors.icon.description: Show split editor icon in title area of editor.

vue.complete.normalizeComponentImportNam.description: Normalize import name for auto import. ("myCompVue" -> "MyComp")

vue.autoInsert.parentheses.description: Auto-wrap `()` to As Expression in interpolations for fix issue #520.

volar.takeOverMode.extension.description: The extension that take over language support for *.ts.

vue.updateImportsOnFileMove.enabled.description: Enabled update imports on file move.

vue-semantic-server.trace.server.description: Traces the communication between VS Code and the language server.

vue-syntactic-server.trace.server.description: Traces the communication between VS Code and the language server.

vue.inlayHints.inlineHandlerLeading.description: Show inlay hints for event argument in inline handlers.

vue.server.maxFileSize.description: Maximum file size for Vue Server to load. (default: 20MB)

enumDescriptions: Auto Detect from Content (Fallback to <kebab-case> if detect failed)
Auto Detect from Content  (Fallback to <PascalCase> if detect failed)

vue.inlayHints.optionsWrapper.description: Show inlay hints for component options wrapper for type support.

vue.inlayHints.missingProps.description: Show inlay hints for missing required props.

vue.autoInsert.bracketSpacing.description: Auto add space between double curly brackets: {{|}} -> {{ | }}

vue.server.maxOldSpaceSize.description: Set --max-old-space-size option on server process. If you have problem on frequently "Request textDocument/** failed." error, try setting higher memory(MB) on it.

enumDescriptions: Auto Detect from Content (Fallback to :kebab-case="..." if detect failed)
Auto Detect from Content (Fallback to :camelCase="..." if detect failed)

vue.codeActions.savingTimeLimit.description: Time limit for code actions on save (ms).

vue.server.additionalExtensions.description: List any additional file extensions that should be processed as Vue files (requires restart).

vue.server.fullCompletionList.description: Enable this option if you want to get complete CompletionList in language client. (Disable for better performance)

vue.doctor.status.description: Show known problems in status bar.

vue.complete.casing.status.description: Show name casing in status bar.
